decks.notes: The deck focuses on quickly ramping out powerful dragons and disrupting opponents' mana bases with cards like Magus of the Moon, Blood Moon, and Chalice of the Void. It also has a strong aggressive strategy with cards like Fury and Broadside Bombardiers to quickly close out games. The deck aims to overwhelm opponents with its fast mana acceleration and disruptive elements, while also providing a strong offense with its dragon creatures and burn spells. It is a high-pressure aggro deck that aims to win the game quickly before opponents can stabilize.

The deck focuses on quickly filling up the graveyard with powerful creatures using cards like Entomb and Reanimate. This allows for the player to cheat out big threats such as Archon of Cruelty and Atraxa, Grand Unifier early in the game. The deck also runs a control package with cards like Force of Will and Daze to protect the combo pieces. The inclusion of disruptive creatures like Murktide Regent and Brazen Borrower helps to control the board and buy time for the combo to go off.

The deck focuses on quickly filling the graveyard with powerful creatures like Archon of Cruelty and Atraxa, Grand Unifier, then using cards like Reanimate and Animate Dead to bring them back onto the battlefield. It also includes disruption spells like Thoughtseize and Force of Will to protect the combo pieces and disrupt the opponent's game plan. The deck aims to quickly assemble its combo pieces and overwhelm the opponent with powerful creatures, while also having some interaction and card selection tools to control the game.

The deck focuses on controlling the game by utilizing lands to disrupt the opponent's strategy. It aims to quickly assemble the Dark Depths and Thespian's Stage combo to create a powerful 20/20 Marit Lage token. The deck includes a variety of utility lands such as Wasteland, The Tabernacle at Pendrell Vale, and Karakas to disrupt the opponent's mana base and key creatures. Exploration and Life from the Loam provide card advantage and mana acceleration, while cards like Mox Diamond and Once Upon a Time help to consistently access the combo pieces. The deck is built to efficiently control the game and win through land-based tactics.

The deck focuses on utilizing a mix of control spells and enchantments to dominate the board and disrupt the opponent's strategy. By combining powerful control cards like Force of Will and Swords to Plowshares with versatile enchantments like Leyline Binding and Fable of the Mirror-Breaker, the deck aims to control the game tempo and outvalue the opponent. Additionally, the inclusion of powerful creatures like Overlord of the Floodpits and Phelia, Exuberant Shepherd provides additional threats and win conditions to close out the game. The deck's flexibility and adaptability make it a formidable force in the Legacy format.

The main focus of this deck is to quickly and efficiently ramp up mana to cast powerful spells that can benefit from sacrificing creatures or discarding cards. By utilizing cards like Dark Ritual, Lotus Petal, and Chrome Mox, the deck aims to accelerate its mana production. The key win condition is to use Necrodominance and Soul Spike in combination with creatures like Sheoldred, the Apocalypse, and Boggart Trawler to deal massive amounts of damage to the opponent. The inclusion of cards like Duress and Thoughseize help disrupt the opponent's game plan.

The main focus of this deck is to quickly build a strong board presence by playing aggressive Human creatures such as Champion of the Parish, Coppercoat Vanguard, and Thalia's Lieutenant. The deck aims to overwhelm the opponent with a fast and powerful aggro strategy, supported by cards like Aether Vial and Mother of Runes for additional utility and protection. The inclusion of cards like Tidus, Rikku, and Wakka adds versatility and resilience to the deck, allowing it to handle a variety of situations and threats effectively. The mana base is carefully constructed to support the tribal theme and maximize consistency in casting the powerful Human creatures.
